name: Now And Then (HisHighness1)
description:
Shane, A notorious criminal, is in jail and awaiting capital punishment for bombing a cave and killing many, Until his unique, somewhat alive watch takes pity on him.

NOTE: THIS IS AN ENHANCED VERSION OF THE GAME. The previous version was taken down because of bugs.

Controls: 

A and D to move left and right

SPACE to activate speed boost

LEFT CLICK to shoot

RIGHT CLICK to grapple

W to jump

UP ARROW to climb ladders
